com.facebook.stats

Class CompositeGaugeCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.stats.AbstractCompositeCounter<C>
      • com.facebook.stats.AbstractCompositeSum<GaugeCounter>
        • com.facebook.stats.CompositeGaugeCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompositeEventCounterIf<GaugeCounter>, EventCounterIf<GaugeCounter>, GaugeCounter

    public class CompositeGaugeCounter
extends AbstractCompositeSum<GaugeCounter>
implements GaugeCounter
    Keeps a list of gauge counters (see AbstractCompositeCounter) that look like one summarized gauge counter.

      • merge

        public GaugeCounter merge(GaugeCounter counter)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCompositeCounter
        Create a new counter that is the result of merging this counter and the argument. No deep copy is performed, so the resulting copy could in theory be a counter that just lists this and counter in a list
